game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: Embark on a journey to recover the lost artifact that holds immense power, hidden within the forgotten ruins deep in the jungle.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and a legendary weapon

task.objective: Gather information from the village elders
task.description: Visit nearby villages and speak with their elders to uncover any clues about the artifact's location.
Navigate through treacherous jungle paths to reach the ancient ruins and search for the artifact.
